QueryResult.text: SELECT D.FUNCTIONAL_AREA, D.PARENT_OBJECT_NAME TABLE_NAME, DECODE(D.OBJECT_TYPE, 'N/A', '[This is the table description entry]', D.OBJECT_NAME) COLUMN_NAME, D.DESCRIPTION FROM CMN_SCHEMA_DESCRIPTIONS D, CMN_ERD_TABLES T WHERE T.TABLE_NAME = D.PARENT_OBJECT_NAME AND T.IS_PUBLISHED = 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC, 2 ASC, DECODE(DECODE(D.OBJECT_TYPE, 'N/A', '[This is the table description entry]', D.OBJECT_NAME), '[This is the table description entry]', 1, 'ID', 2, 'EXTERNAL_SOURCE_ID', 1001, 'EXTERNAL_ID', 1002, 'IS_SYSTEM', 1003, 'IS_ACTIVE', 1004, 'CREATED_BY', 1005, 'CREATED_DATE', 1006, 'LAST_UPDATED_BY', 1007, 'LAST_UPDATED_DATE', 1008, 3)
